pdp.details:
26" inseam
Removable Mini Backpack with a hole at the base for easy access to doggy bags.
pdp.subtitle: Be the hiking buddy who brings the snacks. Made in our super-stretchy, sweat-wicking fabric, complete with leg, hip, and waistband pockets, a mini backpack, and a shirt loop for shedding layers.

productKnowledges.title: Description
productKnowledges.description: Be the hiking buddy who brings the snacks. Made in our super-stretchy, sweat-wicking fabric, complete with leg, hip, and waistband pockets, a mini backpack, and a shirt loop for shedding layers.

productKnowledges.title: Ideal For
productKnowledges.description: High-sweat Recreation — think running, jogging, HIIT, and jumping jacks.

productKnowledges.title: Other Fabric Details
productKnowledges.description:
- Center back and hip pocket in mesh
- Back waistband in branded elastic
- Removable backpack in nylon
